CustomField.description: This is a formula field that copies value from BillingCountryCode (field API Name). This was created because of a Salesforce Maps limitation that did not allow BillingCountryCode field to be used in ETM Rules in Territory Planning (Salesforce Maps) module. Refer to TASK0951428
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Replicates data from BillingCountryCode. For Territory Planning use.
CustomField.label: ETM Country Code
